the insufficient or scanty rainfall.
a man who talks very little.
(a very polite term for) the discharge of urine.
a low-minded man.
a low-minded woman.
a man whose acquaintance with scriptures or general subjects is very little.
being in lesser number (racially, religiously, economically, politically, etc.).

(used in pl.) minority - a) a racial, religious, ethnic or political group smaller than and differing from the larger, controlling group in a community, nation, etc. b) a group, party or faction with a smaller number of votes or adherents than the majority.
a small pond.
